mil7.4.10:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘cakkavattissa cattari angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani cattari angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.4.10:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, cakkavatti catuhi sangahavatthuhi janam sanganhati;
mil7.4.10:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena catassannam parisanam manasam sangahetabbam anuggahetabbam sampahamsetabbam.
mil7.4.10:1.4: Idam, maharaja, cakkavattissa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.10:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, cakkavattissa vijite cora na utthahanti;
mil7.4.10:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kamaragabyapadavihimsavitakka na uppadetabba.
mil7.4.10:2.3: Idam, maharaja, cakkavattissa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.10:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, cakkavatti divase divase samuddapariyantam mahapathavim anuyayati kalyanapapakani vicinamano;
mil7.4.10:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kayakammam vacikammam manokammam divase divase paccavekkhitabbam ‘kim nu kho me imehi tihi thanehi anupavajjassa divaso vitivattati’ti.
mil7.4.10:4.3: Idam, maharaja, cakkavattissa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.10:5.1: ‘Kathambhutassa me rattindiva vitivattantiti pabbajitena abhinham paccavekkhitabban’ti.
mil7.4.10:6.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, cakkavattissa abbhantarabahirarakkha susamvihita hoti;
mil7.4.10:6.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena abbhantaranam bahiranam kilesanam arakkhaya satidovariko thapetabbo.
mil7.4.10:6.3: Idam, maharaja, cakkavattissa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.10:7.1: ‘Satidovariko, bhikkhave, ariyasavako akusalam pajahati kusalam bhaveti, savajjam pajahati, anavajjam bhaveti, suddhamattanam pariharati’”ti.
